Name: Eternal Edge+ Prologue
About the game: Eternal Edge + Prologue is a casual Action Adventure Role-Playing game. This prologue allows you to enjoy the beginning of the Eternal Edge + experience before buying the full game! Features 2-3 hours of gameplay including the Intro, first Major Dungeon, 3 Sub-Dungeons, and free exploration time of 'the Expanse'. Save data will be carried over to the full game, so you don't have to worry about losing your hard-earned progress. Features Travel to far off lands Fight Epic Monsters Uncover mysterious areas And save the good people from a reign of evil!
